Company: Southern Glazer's Wine and Spirits of Louisiana, LLC
Description: A routine investigation by the U.S. Department of Labor's Office of Federal Contract Compliance Programs found that Southern Glazer's Wine and Spirits of Louisiana LLC systemically discriminated against black applicants in its hiring practices at its St. Rose warehouse facility. The company entered into a consent decree and agreed to pay $175,000 in back pay and interest to the 467 affected class members and to extend 13 job offers.
Agency: Office of Federal Contract Compliance Programs
Info Source: https://www.dol.gov/newsroom/releases/ofccp/ofccp20170109

Company: Southern Wine & Spirits of New York, Inc.
Description: The New York Attorney General announced that eight major liquor wholesalers would pay $1.6 million as part of the settlement of an investigation of illegal marketing practices. The announcement did not specify how the amount would be divided up among the eight. Here we assume it was split evenly among them.
Info Source: https://web.archive.org/web/20101111170052/http://www.ag.ny.gov/media_center/2006/aug/aug30a_06.html
